memberdef.argsstring: (self, str title, int x=0, int y=0, bool checked=False)
memberdef.name: __init__

para.verbatim: Draw the checkbox and its components.
Update the checkbox and its components.
Refresh the checkbox and its components.
Return whether the user's mouse cursor is hovering over the checkbox or not. The bounding box of the checkbox includes the button and the text.
Center the checkbox horizontally relative to the specified parent, then return the checkbox itself.
Center the checkbox vertically relative to the specified parent, then return the checkbox itself.

memberdef.argsstring: (self, int parent_x, int parent_y, int parent_width, int parent_height)
memberdef.name: center

para.verbatim: Center the checkbox on both axes relative to the specified parent, then return the checkbox itself.

memberdef.argsstring: (self, int parent_x, int parent_y, int parent_width, int parent_height, int x, int y)
memberdef.name: center_with_offset

para.verbatim: Center the checkbox with center() and offset it by x and y relative to the specified parent, then return the checkbox itself.
Set the size of the checkbox's button, then return the checkbox itself.
Return the size of the checkbox's button.
Set the checked state of the checkbox's button, then return the checkbox itself.
Return the checked state of the checkbox's button.
Offset the checkbox on the x-axis, then return the checkbox itself.
Offset the checkbox on the y-axis, then return the checkbox itself.
